title: Sidebar
description: The Sidebar component is a customizable and flexible navigation panel that supports collapsible menus, nested links, and icons. Ideal for applications, dashboards, and documentation sites requiring structured navigation.

body.raw:
# Sidebar Component Documentation The **Sidebar** component is a flexible and customizable navigation panel. It supports collapsible menus, nested links, and icons, making it ideal for documentation sites, dashboards, and applications with structured navigation. ## Preview and Code Snippet Preview Code Documentation } label="Getting Started"/> } label="Configuration"/>
v1.0.0
{

Main Content

}
 ```tsx import { SidebarProvider, Sidebar, SidebarHeader, SidebarTrigger, SidebarHeaderTitle, SidebarContent, SidebarMenu, SidebarMenuItem, SidebarFooter, NestedLink } from "@/components/sidebar"; import { BookOpen, Settings, FileText } from "lucide-react"; export default function Example() { return ( Documentation } label="Getting Started" href="/docs/getting-started" /> } label="Configuration" href="/docs/configuration" />
v1.0.0
 ); } ``` ## Props ### `` | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |---------------------|----------------|-----------|-------------| | children | React.ReactNode | - | The child components of the provider. | | defaultOpen | boolean | true | Determines if the sidebar is open by default. | | defaultSide | 'left' \| 'right' | 'left' | The default position of the sidebar. | | defaultMaxWidth | number | 280 | The maximum width of the sidebar in pixels. | | showIconsOnCollapse | boolean | true | Determines if icons should be shown when the sidebar is collapsed. | | mobileView | boolean | true | Enables mobile-specific sidebar behavior. | ### `` | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |------------|-------------------|---------|-------------| | className | string | - | Additional CSS classes for styling. | | children | React.ReactNode | - | The child elements inside the sidebar. | ### `` | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |------------|-------------------|---------|-------------| | children | React.ReactNode | - | The header content of the sidebar. | ### `` | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |------------|-------------------|---------|-------------| | children | React.ReactNode | - | The main content area of the sidebar. | ### `` | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |------------|-------------------|---------|-------------| | children | React.ReactNode | - | The footer section of the sidebar. | ### `` | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |------------|-------------------|---------|-------------| | children | React.ReactNode | - | The navigation menu inside the sidebar. | ### `` | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |--------------|-------------------|------------|-------------| | icon | React.ReactNode | - | An optional icon to display in the menu item. | | label | string | - | The text label for the menu item. | | href | string | - | The link to navigate to. | | children | React.ReactNode | - | Sub-menu items if applicable. | | isActive | boolean | undefined | Manually set active state. | | defaultOpen | boolean | false | Whether the submenu is open by default. | | alwaysOpen | boolean | false | Keeps the submenu permanently open. | | isCollapsable | boolean | false | Whether the submenu can be collapsed. | ### `` | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |------------|-------------------|---------|-------------| | children | React.ReactNode | - | The child components inside the layout. | ### `` | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |------------|-------------------|---------|-------------| | children | React.ReactNode | - | The main content area. |
